contentBlocks.title: General Spa Lighting Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa lighting must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa lighting must be installed by a qualified person.
